name: Pas si vite
description:
Pas si vite

A game made over 72hours during the 40 th Ludum Dare

Pas si vite is a versus game (but no multi mode for now).
The player must fight the enemy tank and arrived at 10 points.

Theme

Theme was : the more you have, the worse it is

The more the player (or the enemy) has bullet the more they will move slowly.
The  are represented by the little balls placed next to the players.

 Controls

You can play with a keyboard or a controller

With the keyboard:
Use the arrows or wasd to move  and the mouse to shoot

With the controller:
Right stick for move, left stick for aim and x or LT for shoot
